entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 7:49 PM CST Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:49 PM CST Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 7:49 PM CST Thursday 23 March 2023
